info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 5:26PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A line of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Otero, central Las Animas and southeastern Pueblo Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 525 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of developing thunderstorms extending from near Delhi to 12 miles southeast of Thatcher. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Delhi, Thatcher and Timpas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
